mapper.select: select a.*,c.project_id,c.name projectname,e.name keshi ,d.*,f.name docname from tb_patient a,tb_project_combo b,tb_project c,tb_patient_project d,tb_param e,tb_user f where a.combo_id=b.combo_id and b.project_id=c.project_id and d.project_id=c.project_id and c.param_id=e.param_id and f.user_id=d.user_id and a.code=#{onecode } order by e.name

select distinct * from tb_brief a,tb_detail_project b,tb_detail c where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and time= (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `tb_group` ) and b.detail_id=c.detail_id and b.project_id=#{0 } and a.patient_id=#{1 }
select * from tb_brief a,tb_detail b,tb_patient c where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and a.patient_id=c.patient_id and c.code=#{0} order by b.type desc
select * from tb_user where account=#{0} and pwd=#{1};

select * from tb_user a,tb_role_dept b,tb_role_power c,tb_power d,tb_menu e WHERE a.role_dept_id=b.role_dept_id and b.role_id=c.role_id and c.power_id = d.power_id and d.menu_id=e.menu_id and user_id=#{0} and a.role_dept_id=#{1}
